twoSetSkill.name: Embers at Dawn 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: Boost Total DMG by 15%. Combo or Charged ATK further boosts Total DMG by 15% for 15s. Can be refreshed.

threeSetSkill.name: Born of Fire 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Host has 10% bonus Attack Speed and takes 15% less Elemental DMG.
